product_name: Patagonia Lightweight Synchilla Snap-T Fleece Jacket - Men's
long_description: The Patagonia Lightweight Synchilla Snap-T Fleece jacket offers signature style and features warm, durable fleece. Synchilla(R) keeps you warm and comfortable when the temperature dips, and it continues to insulate even when wet. 4-snap placket is reinforced with Supplex(R) nylon. Y-joint(TM) sleeves enhance comfort and fit. Features stretch binding on the cuffs and straight-cut hem. On-seam, snap chest pocket reinforced with Supplex(R) nylon. Relaxed fit.
short_description: The Patagonia Lightweight Synchilla Snap-T Fleece jacket offers signature style and features warm, durable fleece.
